decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Preliminary Ecological Appraisal Report; Design, Access & Heritage Statement; Arboricultural Survey and Planning Integration Report; Dusk Activity Survey Report; LE-PL-EX-01; LE-PL-EX-02; LE-PL-EX-03; LE-PL-EX-05; LE-PL-EX-06; LE-PL-EX-07; LE-PL-EX-08; LE-PL-EX-09; LE-PL-EX-10; LE-PL-GA-00; LE-PL-GA-01; LE-PL-GA-02; LE-PL-GA-03; LE-PL-GA-04; LE-PL-GA-05; LE-PL-GA-06; LE-PL-GA-07; LE-PL-GA-08; LE-PL-GA-09; LE-PL-GA-10; LE-PL-GA-11; LE-PL-GA-12
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The development shall be completed in accordance with the details as approved under planning reference P/1934/20 regarding materials unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. 
REASON: To ensure the materials used in the construction of the development are appropriate in relation to the conservation area in accordance with policies DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 5 - The development hereby permitted shall be constructed in brickwork bond to match the existing dwelling. The development shall thereafter be retained in that form. 
REASON: To safeguard the appearance of the conservation area and the locality, in accordance with Policies DM1 and DM7 of the Councils Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Condition : 6 - The rooflights hereby permitted shall be in conservation styles and flush with the plane of the roof slope and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
REASON: To safeguard the appearance of the locally listed building and the locality, in accordance with Policies DM1 and DM7 of the Councils Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.

Condition : 7 - Prior to the completion of the development, the following biodiversity enhancement works shall be undertaken: 
a) A Schwegler 1SP Sparrow terrace to be permanently installed within the fabric of the north elevation of the extended building at just below roof eaves level;
b) A Scwegler No PA House Martin Nest with droppings deflector to be permanently installed to the exterior of the eastern aspect of the existing building or just below roof eaves level; and
c) Three Schwegler 2FN Bat Boxes to be fitted in appropriate locations at heights of 4 to 5 plus metres above ground level with a mix of aspects (sunwise round from east to south-west) in suitable trees in the rear garden, ensuring that a clear flight path is maintained to the entrance of each. 
These features shall remain in place thereafter unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority. Any external illumination will be so designed and operated as to avoid potential impacts on the roosting, foraging and commuting activities of bat species.
Reason: To ensure the conservation and enhancement of biodiversity in accordance with local plan policies DM20 and DM21, and with the requirements of the London Plan and National Planning Policy Framework, and to ensure that the proposals within the approved ecological  reports .
description: Single and two storey side to rear extensions; front entrance canopy; alterations to roof; side and rear dormers; installation of rooflights in rooflopes at side and rear; external alterations (demolition of attached garage and front extension)
